plot: In 1970s Australia, when 'care' equalled repression, three girls escape from their institution for one brief moment of liberty.
title: Moth
plot_es: In 1970s Australia, when 'care' equalled repression, three girls escape from their institution for one brief moment of liberty.
plot_en: In 1970s Australia, when 'care' equalled repression, three girls escape from their institution for one brief moment of liberty.
